headline: THE RITZ-CARLTON, AMELIA ISLAND INTRODUCES NEW SIGNATURE EXPERIENCES
summary: The Ritz-Carlton, Amelia Island, nestled on a pristine barrier island in Northeastern Florida, has just launched seven new Signature Experiences, part of a brand-wide initiative inviting guests to connect more deeply with each Ritz-Carlton destination through thoughtfully designed, location-specific programming.

raw.headline: THE RITZ-CARLTON, AMELIA ISLAND INTRODUCES NEW SIGNATURE EXPERIENCES

headline: Luxury Group, Marriott International Named Official Hotel Partner of the United States SailGP Team
summary: NEW YORK, January 15, 2026--The U.S. SailGP Team today announced a multi-year brand partnership with the Luxury Group, Marriott International naming the portfolio as their first Global Hotel Partner of the United States SailGP team beginning with the 2026 season. The collaboration unites two global brands with a shared commitment to excellence, innovation, and setting the pace in their respective industries.
